snippet.title: Sanctum 2 - The Pursuit (DLC3) Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
The Pursuit is the third DLC for Sanctum 2! It adds two new unlockable weapons, one of them being the Drone Launcher, that looks like a friggin PORTABLE AIRCRAFT CARRIER!

Also two new towers, one of them being the Mind Control Spire, which mind controls enemies, having them fight for you instead!

New enemies, four new maps, new perks, UGHH so much new and awesome stuff, you'll just have to check it out for yourself: http://store.steampowered.com/app/210770/
